Descriptions.Text: Deal {1} Nature damage every {2} sec to up to {3} enemies inside of your Healing Rain.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a {1}% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
While Feral Spirits are active, Chain Lightning and Crash Lightning causes your wolves to attack all nearby enemies for {1} Physical damage every {2} sec for the next {3} sec.

When you critically heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing the lowest percentage health friendly party or raid target within {1} yards for {2}% of the amount healed.
Increases Leech by {1}% and reduces damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by {2}%.
For the next {1} sec, {2}% of your damage and healing is converted to healing on up to {3} nearby injured party or raid members.

Summons a totem at the target location for {1} sec. All allies within {2} yards of the totem gain {3}% increased health. If an ally dies, the totem will be consumed to allow them to Reincarnate with {4}% health and mana.

Cannot reincarnate an ally who dies to massive damage.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by {1}%.
Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with {1}% of maximum health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain {1}% increased health for {2} sec.
Returns all dead party members to life with {1}% of maximum health and mana.  Cannot be cast when in combat.
Cleanse Spirit, Wind Shear, Purge, and totem casts no longer cancel Ghost Wolf.
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal for {1} sec and immediately healing for {2}. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within {3} yds.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for {1} sec, replacing Chain Lightning with Lava Beam, removing the cooldown on Lava Burst, and increasing the damage of Lava Burst by an amount equal to your critical strike chance.

When you transform into the Flame Ascendant, instantly cast a Lava Burst at all enemies affected by your Flame Shock, and refresh your Flame Shock durations to {2} sec.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for {1} sec, immediately dealing {2} Nature damage to any enemy within {3} yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by {4}%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a {5} yd range.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, increase the damage of your next Lava Lash by {1}% and reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by {2} sec.
Astral Shift reduces damage taken by an additional {1}%.
Yanks you through the twisting nether back to Stormwind City. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking {1}% less damage for {2} sec.
While Reincarnation is off cooldown, your maximum health is increased by {1}%. While you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down {2}% faster.
Increases the damage of your Flame Shock, Lava Burst, Lava Beam, and Fire Elemental by {1}%.
Reduces the cooldown of {ffffffff|Totemic Recall} by {1} sec.
Increases the damage of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Storm Elemental by {1}%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after {1} sec, stunning all enemies within {2} yards for {3} sec.
Heals the friendly target for {1}, then jumps up to {2} yards to heal the {3} most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by {4}% with each jump.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing {1} Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects {2} total targets.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing {1} Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects {2} total targets.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Maelstrom per target hit.}

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing {1} Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects {2} total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than {3} target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by {4}%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by {5} sec.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Your Chain Heal and Healing Rain spells have a {1}% increased chance to critically heal, and when they critically heal the target is dispelled of all harmful magical effects.

Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within {2} yards for {3}% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.
Reduces the cooldown of Primordial Wave by {1} sec.

Flame Shock's damage occurs {1}% more often.

If Flame Shock is dispelled, a volcanic eruption wells up beneath the dispeller, exploding for {2} Fire damage and knocking them into the air.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by {1}%, up to a maximum of {2} stacks.

Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec.

Whenever enemies within {2} yards of the totem deal direct damage, the totem will deal {3}% of the damage dealt back to attacker.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing {1} Nature damage. Hitting {2} or more targets enhances your weapons for {3} sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal {4} Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond {5} targets.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by {6}%, up to a maximum of {7} stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by {1}%.
Chain Lightning now jumps to {2} extra targets.
{ffffffff|Totemic Recall} affects an additional totem.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by {1} sec.

Casting Lava Burst has a {1}% chance to activate Ascendance for {2} sec.

|T135791:24|t {ffffffff|Ascendance}

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for {3} sec, replacing Chain Lightning with Lava Beam, removing the cooldown on Lava Burst, and increasing the damage of Lava Burst by an amount equal to your critical strike chance.

When you transform into the Flame Ascendant, instantly cast a Lava Burst at all enemies affected by your Flame Shock, and refresh your Flame Shock durations to {4} sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional {1}% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Strike your target for {1} Physical damage, increase your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by {2}%, and increases damage dealt by Windfury Weapon by {3}% for {4} sec.

A burst of water at the target location heals up to six injured allies within {1} yards for {2}.

Cooldown increased by {3} sec for each target effectively healed.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for {1} sec.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by {2}%.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by {1}% and healing them for {2} when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every few seconds. Maximum {3} charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by {1}% and healing them for {2} when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every few seconds. Maximum {3} charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing {1} Nature damage.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by {1}% and its healing is increased by {2}% if the target is below {3}% health.
Summons a totem at the target location with {1} health for {2} sec. {3} damage from each attack against allies within {4} yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Summons a totem at the target location for {1} sec. The totem pulses every {2} sec, rooting all enemies within {3} yards for {4} sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer {5}% movement speed reduction.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for {1} min. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a {2}% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for {3} over {4} sec.
Causes the earth within {1} yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing {2} Physical damage over {3} sec and has a {4}% chance to knock the enemy down.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by {1}%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals {1}% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals {2}% additional damage.
Icefury causes your Frost Shocks to damage up to {1} additional enemies and targets hit take {2}% increased Nature damage from your spells for {3} sec.
When you successfully Purge a beneficial effect, the enemy suffers {1} Nature damage over {2} sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by {1}%, and Stormstrike has a {2}% chance to generate {3} stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing {1} Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by {2}% or Mastery by {3}% for {4} sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains {5} additional charge.
Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing {1} Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by {2}% or Mastery by {3}% for {4} sec.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within {1} sec will increase all damage dealt by {2}% for {3} sec. This can only occur once every {4} sec.
Your damaging critical strikes deal {1}% damage instead of the usual {2}%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by {1}.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Your Feral Spirits are now imbued with Fire, Frost, or Lightning, increasing your damage dealt with that element by {1}%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by {1}%.
Increase all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by {1}%.
During Hex, the target is slowed by {1}% and for {2} sec after Hex ends.

You turn ethereal, making you immune to all physical damage, but unable to attack or cast spells and your movement speed is reduced by {1}%. Lasts for {2} sec.

Use Ethereal Form again to shift out.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Earth Shock and Earthquake by {1}.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Elemental Blast by {2}.
Changes your viewpoint to the targeted location for {1} sec.
Lunge at your enemy as a ghostly wolf, biting them to deal {1} Physical damage.

Summons two Elemental Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for {1} sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Elemental Feral Spirit summoned grants you {2}% increased Fire, Frost, or Nature damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every {3} sec for {4} sec.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by {1}%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for {1} sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
{2}% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last {3}% longer.
Erupt a burst of fiery damage from all targets affected by your Flame Shock, dealing {1} Fire damage to up to {2} targets within {3} yds of your Flame Shock targets.

Sears the target with fire, causing {1} Fire damage and then an additional {2} Fire damage over {3} sec.

Flame Shock can be applied to a maximum of {4} targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by {1} sec and Flame Shock deals damage {2}% faster.
Imbue your off-hand weapon with the element of Fire for {1} min, causing each of your attacks to deal {2} additional Fire damage.
Imbue your weapon with the element of Fire for {1} min, causing each of your attacks to deal {2} additional Fire damage.
Consuming Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next heal by {1}%.
Casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of your Nature spells by {1} sec.
Increases the Maelstrom generated by Lightning Bolt and Lava Burst by {1}, and their Elemental Overloads by {2}.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and casting Chain Heal on a target affected by Riptide consumes Riptide, increasing the healing of your Chain Heal by {1}%.
Increases your attack speed by {1}% for your next {2} melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Casting Frost Shock increases the damage of your next Lava Burst by {1}%.
Casting Flame Shock reduces the mana cost of your next heal by {1}% and increases its healing effectiveness by {2}%.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within {1} sec to increase the damage of Windfury by {2}%, stacking up to {3} times.
Chills the target with frost, causing {1} Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.

Casting Earth Shock or Earthquake while Ascendance is active extends the duration of Ascendance by {1} sec.

Casting Elemental Blast while Ascendance is active extends the duration of Ascendance by {2} sec.
Turn into a Ghost Wolf, increasing movement speed by {1}% and preventing movement speed from being reduced below {2}%.

Reduces the cooldown of Spirit Walk by {1} sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Gust of Wind by {2} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by {1} sec and increases your movement speed by {2}% while it is active.
Purges the enemy target, removing {1} beneficial Magic effects.
Summons a totem at your feet that will redirect all harmful spells cast within {1} yards on a nearby party or raid member to itself. Will not redirect area of effect spells. Lasts {2} sec.
When Capacitor Totem fades or is destroyed, another Capacitor Totem is automatically dropped in the same place.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by {1}%, and causes your next Frost Shock to hit {2} additional target per Maelstrom Weapon stack consumed, up to {3}.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring {1} health to up to {2} allies over {3} sec.

Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec that heals an injured party or raid member within {2} yards for {3} every {4} sec.

If you already know {ffffffff|Healing Stream Totem}, instead gain {5} additional charge of {ffffffff|Healing Stream Totem}.
A quick surge of healing energy that restores {1} of a friendly target's health.

Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec, which pulses every {2} sec, healing all party or raid members within {3} yards for {4}.

Healing increased by {5}% when not in a raid.
An efficient wave of healing energy that restores {1} of a friendly targets health.

Increases haste by {1}% for all party and raid members for {2} sec.

Allies receiving this effect will become Exhausted and unable to benefit from Heroism or Time Warp again for {3} min.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for {1} sec. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit {2}. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
Every {1} mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next {2} Chain Heals heal for an additional {3}% and not reduce with each jump.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a {1}% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by {2}% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by {3}% for {4} sec.

Strike your target with an icy blade, dealing {1} Frost damage and snaring them by {2}% for {3} sec.

Ice Strike increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by {4}%.

Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing {1} Frost damage and causing your next {2} Frost Shocks to deal {3}% increased damage and generate {4} Maelstrom.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {5} Maelstrom.}

Increases the healing of Earthliving by {1}%.

Earthliving always triggers on targets below {2}% health.
Imbuing your weapon with Flametongue increases your Fire spell damage by {1}% for {2} hour.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage or healing of spells it affects by {1}% per stack.
Primordial Wave increases the healing done by your next Healing Wave by {1}%.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
Your successful Purge, Cleanse Spirit, Healing Stream Totem, Hex, and Wind Shear casts generate {1} Maelstrom during combat.
Lava Lash increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by {1}% for {2} sec.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing {1} Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Maelstrom.}
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing {1} Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing {1} Fire damage.

Damage is increased by {2}% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to {3} nearby targets.
Your Flame Shock damage over time has a {1}% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Lava Burst and cause your next Lava Burst to be instant.
Consuming {1} stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your physical abilities by {2}% for {3} sec.

Hurls a bolt of lightning at the target, dealing {1} Nature damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Maelstrom.}
Hurls a bolt of lightning at the target, dealing {1} Nature damage.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing {1} Nature damage over {2} sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake make your target a Lightning Rod for {1} sec. Lightning Rods take {2}% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.

Surround yourself with a shield of lightning for {1} min.

Melee attackers have a {2}% chance to suffer {3} Nature damage and have a {4}% chance to generate a stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at a time.

Surround yourself with a shield of lightning for {1} min.

Melee attackers have a {2}% chance to suffer {3} Nature damage and have a {4}% chance to generate {5} Maelstrom.

Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at a time.

Surround yourself with a shield of lightning for {1} min.

Melee attackers have a {2}% chance to suffer {3} Nature damage.

The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing {1} Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to {2} enemies within {3} yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every {4} sec for {5} sec, dealing {6} Fire damage to all enemies within {7} yards.
Healing Stream Totem heals for {1}% more each time it ticks.
Healing Tide Totem's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec and it heals for {2}% more each time it pulses.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to {1} times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by {2}% and increase the damage or healing of your next spell by {3}%. A maximum of {4} stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to {1} times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by {2}%. A maximum of {3} stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.

Your Stormstrike casts restore {1} mana to you and {2} allies nearest to you within {3} yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore {1} mana to you and {2} allies nearest to you within {3} yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.

Your Lava Burst casts restore {1} mana to you and {2} allies nearest to you within {3} yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec, granting {2}% increased mana regeneration to allies within {3} yards.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by {1}%.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature or Frost spell by {1}%.
Increases healing from your spells by up to {1}%, based on the current health of your target. Lower health targets are healed for more.
Your Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, and Chain Lightning casts have a {1}% chance to trigger a second cast on the same target, dealing {2}% of normal damage and generating less Maelstrom.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by {1} sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to {2} enemies near the target.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at {1}% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by {1}%.
When your health is brought below {1}%, you instantly heal for {2}% of your maximum health.  Cannot occur more than once every {3} sec.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Reduces the cooldown of Ascendance by {1} sec, and you gain {2}% additional Haste while Ascendance is active.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to {1} Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Healing Rain instantly restores {1} health to {2} allies within its area, and its radius is increased by {3} yards.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by {1} sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within {1} yards every {2} sec for {3} sec.
Casting Lava Burst has a {1}% chance to cause your next {2} Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning casts to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time.
If an interrupt is used on you while you are not casting, gain {1}% Haste and become immune to crowd control, interrupt, and cast pushback effects for {2} sec.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals {1}% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.
Primordial Wave generates {1} stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.
An instant weapon strike that causes {1} Physical damage.
Every {1} casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by {1}%.
Your healing critical strikes heal for {1}% healing instead of the usual {2}%.
Casting Primordial Wave triggers Lava Surge immediately and every {1} sec for {2} sec. Lava Surges triggered by Primordial Wave increase the damage of your next Lava Burst by {3}%.

Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, dealing {1} Shadow damage and apply Flame Shock to an enemy, or heal an ally for {2}.

Your next Lightning Bolt will also hit all targets affected by your Flame Shock for {3}% of normal damage.

Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, dealing {1} Shadow damage and apply Flame Shock to an enemy, or heal an ally for {2}.

Your next Lava Burst will also hit all targets affected by your Flame Shock for {3}% of normal damage.

Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, dealing {1} Shadow damage and apply Flame Shock to an enemy, or heal an ally for {2} and apply Riptide to them.

Your next Healing Wave will also hit all targets affected by your Riptide for {3}% of normal healing.
Purges the enemy target, removing {1} beneficial Magic effect.
Removes all Magic effects from a friendly target.
Maelstrom Weapon can now stack {1} additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage or healing of spells it affects by an additional {2}% per stack.
Your Healing Surge is {1}% more effective on yourself.
Allows you to resurrect yourself upon death with {1}% health and mana. This effect can occur only once every {2} minutes.
Increases the duration of Mana Tide Totem by {1} sec and increases its radius by {2} yards.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: {1}% from Healing Wave, {2}% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and {3}% from Chain Heal.

If there are more than {1} enemies within {2} yards when you cast Stormstrike, you also cast a Chain Lightning on the target, dealing {3} Nature damage.

Otherwise, you conjure bolts of lightning to up to {4} furthest enemies within {5} yards dealing {6} Nature damage.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for {1} and an additional {2} over {3} sec.
Lava Burst and Lava Burst Overload damage reduces the cooldown of Primordial Wave by {1} sec.
Flame Shock damage has a {1}% chance to generate {2} Maelstrom.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by {1}% for {2} sec.

Your Heroism spell now has a {1} sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by {2}%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for {3} sec.

In addition, Heroism is no longer affected by Exhaustion.
Flame Shock damage over time critical strikes reduce the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by {1} sec, and Flame Shock has a {2}% increased critical strike chance.
Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within {2} yards by {3}% for {4} sec.

While in Ghost Wolf, you heal {1}% health every {2} sec.

Increases the movement speed of Ghost Wolf by an additional {3}%.

Summons a totem at the target location for {1} sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within {2} yards by {3}%. Immediately and every {4} sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain {1}% increased movement speed and {2}% damage reduction every {3} sec, stacking up to {4} times.
When you cast Spiritwalker's Grace, you become immune to Silence and Interrupt effects for {1} sec.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for {1} sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for {1} sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by {2}%.
After using Mana Tide Totem, the cast time and mana cost of Healing Wave and Chain Heal is reduced by {1}% for {2} sec.
Each additional Lightning Bolt generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by {1}% for {2} sec.
Each additional Lava Burst generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by {1}% for {2} sec.
While Ascendance is active, generate {1} Maelstrom Weapon stack every {2} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by {1} sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of {2} sec.
Summons a totem with {1}% of your health at the target location for {2} sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.
Summons a totem at your feet for {1} sec that grants {2}% physical damage reduction to you and the {3} allies nearest to the totem within {4} yards.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind that damage the Shaman's enemies for {1} sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, each time you cast Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning, the cast time of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning is reduced by {2}%, stacking up to {3} times.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormbringer by {1}%.
Stormbringer now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal {1}% additional damage as Nature damage.
Stormstrike has a {1}% chance to strike the target an additional time for {2}% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next {1} Lightning Bolts to deal {2}% more damage, and also causes your next {3} Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.

If you already know {ffffffff|Stormkeeper}, instead gain {4} additional charge of {ffffffff|Stormkeeper}.
Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next {1} Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to deal {2}% more damage and be instant cast.
Energizes both your weapons with lightning and delivers a massive blow to your target, dealing a total of {1} Physical damage.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing {1} Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for {2} sec.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within {1} sec:

{FFFFFFFF|Flame Shock}: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to {2} additional target within {3} yards of the target.

{FFFFFFFF|Lightning Bolt}: Your next cast will cause an additional {4} Elemental Overloads.

{FFFFFFFF|Chain Lightning}: Your next cast will chain to {5} additional target.

{FFFFFFFF|Lava Burst}: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by {6} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Frost Shock}: Freezes the target in place for {7} sec.

Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Shield by {1}% and it has an additional {2}% chance to trigger Maelstrom Weapon when triggered.

Increases the healing done by Earth Shield by {3}%.

Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Shield by {1}% and causes it to generate an additional {2} Maelstrom when triggered.

Increases the healing done by Earth Shield by {3}%.

Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Shield by {1}%.

Increases the healing done by Earth Shield by {2}%.
